name: Airthereal MA5000 Commercial Ozone Generator, High Capacity Ozone Machine Odor Removal - Home Air Ionizers O3 Deodorizer for Rooms, Smoke, Cars and Pets, Eliminate Odors up to 2000sq.ft., Blue
